body.p: To His Excellency Beriah Magoffin Governer of Kentucky

Your Petitioner Martin Raines would respectfully represent that at the August Term of the Whitley Circuit Court he with Wm Ellison was fined Ten dollars each for a breach of the peace. Having got a little tite he with others went past one of his neighbors houses & stoped in got their supper had a Jollification of a him & spoke a fiew smartly words in presence of a woman there was no harm done no licks struck in fact no quarreling your petioner would represent that he is poor and unable to pay the fine He has a family to support and is one handed so that he is hardly able to support them -- He asks that you will remit the fine and he promises not to be guilty of a like offense again

Whitley Cir Ct
$10 each } breach
M. Raines
Wm Ellison
Remission Issd
March 14. 1861
